newsitem.title: LATVIA: Latvian shares buoyant, Unibanka most traded.
newsitem.headline: Latvian shares buoyant, Unibanka most traded.

text.p: Latvian shares were buoyant on Tuesday with market turnover high, especially in Unibanka, the official list's leading stock.
Total turnover came to 169,340 lats and trade in Unibanka totalled 69,167 lats, making it the most traded share.
The other share on the official list, Riga Transport Fleet, was unchanged at one lat as shares worth 24,025 changed owners.
In the secondary market, turnover in the Daugavpils Chain factory was 47,968 lats and the share price fell one santime to 1.14 lats.
Several other shares on the secondary list were traded actively.
Fish cannery Kaija rose to 1.24 lats from 1.20 lats and turnover totalled 6,138 lats while the Kurzeme Lock factory turned over 7,975 lats as it climbed to 46 santimes from 40.
Trade in the Roja fish cannery was also busy at 5,588 lats and the share price rose to 1.46 lats from 1.27 lats.
